name: Vegas Crime Driver Full - Be a gangster
name_original: Vegas Crime Driver Full - Be a gangster
description:
Try how to be a crime driver in Vegas! Join the crime business of gangsters and do their tasks. Steal cars and run away from the police. Deep into crime life with interesting story and show the gangsters who is the real man. The gangsters are really bad guys. They need you to drive cars and help them to terrorize the city. But... It is not the end. Do missions in Vegas and see what might happen if you complete all of them or if the police catch you.

Features of Vegas Crime Driver:

- Interesting story
- Car thefts
- Cruel Vegas gangsters
- Police cars are chasing you
- Time limit
- Challenging missions

Do what gangsters do in Vegas! Steal cars and run from the police. Be ready for hard time limit because now your life is full of crime! Drive your car to Night Club or to the Jewelry Store to rob it. Meet bad gangsters. Be a crime driver in Vegas! Run from the police as a professional. The gangsters are cruel. They took your girlfriend and force you to help them.

Fight with rough gangsters and the police! Test the power of your car. Deep into crime driving. Do you like games about gangsters or the police? So, it is time to try our Vegas Crime Driver. Try car driving without rules. A great driving simulator for men!

You can drive as fast as you want in Vegas Crime Driver. Try the driving along Vegas and enjoy the crime vs police atmosphere. Drive car, don't lose the control or the police catch you. Feel like a gangster with our driving simulator!
